infoCard.headline: Software Development Intern @ Tharasis
infoCard.bio: I am a dedicated full-stack developer proficient with React, Flutter, and Node.js. I am also a UI/UX designer for web and mobile apps. I am a 3rd year Computer Science student studying at KLS GIT.
